mapper.select: select article.*,articlebody.body,board.cname,deleted.deleteby,deleted.deletetime from articlebody,article,deleted,board where article.originid=deleted.originid and article.boardid=deleted.boardid and deleted.boardid=board.boardid and articlebody.articleid=article.articleid order by deleted.deletetime desc limit #{begin},#{count};
mapper.insert: insert into deleted(boardid,originid,deletetime,deleteby) values (#{boardid},#{originid},#{deletetime},#{deleteby}) On DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE originid=#{originid}
